pr_title: SOLR-14281: Make sharedLib configurable through SysProp

timeline.message: SOLR-14281: Make sharedLib configurable through SysProp and allow multiple comma separated paths

timeline.bodyText: I'm almost certain we've got a utility that does this so that you don't have to define your regexp
timeline.author: dsmiley

replies.bodyText: I tried StrUtils.splitSmart() but we don't need the smartness of not splitting inside quotes etc, and it does not trim whitespace around comma. So I'll keep this unless you know about a better split-util somewhere.
replies.author: janhoy
